mapper.update:
update st_trade_record
seller_account_id = #{sellerAccountId,jdbcType=CHAR},
buyer_account_id = #{buyerAccountId,jdbcType=CHAR},
stock_id = #{stockId,jdbcType=CHAR},
quote_price = #{quotePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
date_time = #{dateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
buy_fee = #{buyFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sell_fee = #{sellFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
deal_tax = #{dealTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=CHAR}

update st_trade_record set seller_account_id = #{sellerAccountId,jdbcType=CHAR}, buyer_account_id = #{buyerAccountId,jdbcType=CHAR}, stock_id = #{stockId,jdbcType=CHAR}, quote_price = #{quotePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, date_time = #{dateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, buy_fee = #{buyFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sell_fee = #{sellFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, deal_tax = #{dealTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=CHAR}
